definitions.body: give thanks, confess (orig. acknowledge ?) is commonly derived, perhaps from gestures accompanying the act, v. Thes Lag:Or. ii. 22, yet connexion uncertain; Aram. Pa. [[וַדֵּי]], Aph. [[אוֹדִּי]] confess, 0aydiy, 04twdy id.; but Eth. 0astaw4daya: accuse, perh. also fr. gesture; Palm. definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[יְדוּ אֶל־]] shoot (arrows) at Je 50:14 (rd. prob., with some Codd. [[יְרוּ]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיַּדּוּ בִּי]] La 3:53 and they cast (stones) on me; Inf. [[יַדּוֹת]] Zec 2:4 to cast down (the horns of the nations).
